name: AddCommentToList
description:
Add a comment to a specific list in ClickUp.

This tool allows you to add a comment to a specified list in ClickUp. Use it when you need to provide additional information or feedback on a list.

parameters.name: list_identifier
parameters.description: The unique ID of the list where the comment will be added.

parameters.name: comment_text
parameters.description: The text of the comment to be added to the list. This should contain the message or information you wish to convey.

parameters.name: assignee_id
parameters.description: The ID of the user to whom the comment is assigned. This should be an integer value representing the user's unique identifier.

parameters.name: notify_all
parameters.description: If true, notifications are sent to everyone, including the comment creator.

value_schema.description: If `notify_all` is true, notifications will be sent to everyone including the creator of the comment.
